mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ordersno, paymentno, memberno, productno, cnt, tot, states, rdate) VALUES(orders_seq.nextval, #{paymentno}, #{memberno}, #{productno}, #{cnt}, #{tot}, #{states}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT o.ordersno, o.paymentno, o.memberno, p.productno, p.title, p.price, m.mname, o.cnt, o.tot, o.states, o.rdate FROM orders o, product p, member m WHERE (o.productno = p.productno) AND (m.memberno = o.memberno) AND paymentno=#{paymentno} AND o.memberno=#{memberno} ORDER BY ordersno DESC
